name: Droidwars IV
overview: This is a simulation of droids armed with different weapons that move erratically around in an enclosed arena. The arena has a floor of magnets, where all the droids can stay powered and fight amongst each other. The colored bullets they fire only works on other colored droids, so those droids that have the same color, is on the same team. The player is the decision maker, and has the range of different droids that he can transfer into the arena by simply pressing a number between 1 and 9. The 2 teams have only limited amount of energy to produce new droids, and every droid has good and bad properties.
